functions.tag: {display:{Name:'[{"text":"ENDIA","color":"dark_gray","obfuscated":true},{"text":"オメガ","color":"yellow","bold":true,"obfuscated":false},{"text":"ENDIA","color":"dark_gray","obfuscated":true}]',Lore:['{"text":"|","color":"black"}','[{"text":"RANK:","color":"gray"},{"text":"★★★？","color":"blue"}]','{"text":"|","color":"black"}','{"text":" "}','{"text":"とある魔物が持つ大鎌。","color":"dark_purple"}','{"text":"その中には底知れない力が眠っているという。","color":"dark_purple"}','{"text":"七つの煌めき、果つらぬ闇。","color":"black","bold":true}','{"text":"其は黄泉より喚ぶ。幽明を越え終焉へと誘う。","color":"black","bold":true}','{"text":"今はただ、目醒めの刻を待つ。","color":"black","bold":true}']},Unbreakable:1b,ID:35,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:255s},{id:"minecraft:smite",lvl:100s},{id:"minecraft:bane_of_arthropods",lvl:100s},{id:"minecraft:knockback",lvl:10s},{id:"minecraft:fire_aspect",lvl:5s},{id:"minecraft:efficiency",lvl:10s}]}
